description: This table contains the review history for a given patient order template.  The review history consists of the review action, the reviewing user, and the instant of review.

columns.name: OTP_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the patient order template record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ORD_REVIEW_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The review status category ID of an order in the treatment plan manager.  An order can be unreviewed, reviewed, or changed since it was last reviewed.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Unreviewed


Reviewed


Changed

columns.name: ORD_REV_UPDT_USR_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who changed the review status for the patient order template record.

columns.name: ORD_REVIEW_UPDT_TM
columns.description: The date and time the review status stored in the related line in the patient order template was updated.
